title: VERMEER - Rembrandt Chat Assistant
one_line_description: This project involved creating an LLM-based chatbot designed to operate on local machines. The chatbot assists users of Rembrant in troubleshooting their problems when at sea without access to a helpdesk. It was integrated with a custom web-based navigable user manual to provide an augmented user experience.
details: VERMEER is a custom chatbot designed by myself and a couple of others at BMT to help our customers troubleshoot Rembrandt when at sea with limited Communication.

I implemented a custom Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) pipeline and a locally hosted language model, in order to meet the stringent needs of both high quality responses, with no internet access and limited GPU memory.
I built a containerised environment hosting both an Ollama container to function as a backend to the app and an AnythingLLM server to work as the front end.
I had to patch the AnythingLLM repository to allow for the text splitting to use custom separators which allowed me to tailor the RAG embedding process to better suit our needs.
I also built an interactive web version of the Rembrandt Training Manual to demonstrate and deploy our chatbot onto, which the internal customer was especially pleased with.
With the interactive demonstration showing the benefits of cloud-based deployment, I designed and implemented an Azure Cloud solution and deployed the assistant throughout the company.
